backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor for users, tasks, reminders, completions, rewards, and access control, including user profile management and task-related types and storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI redesign tasks to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides concise human‑written summaries of major frontend files and their roles in the game‑styled UI.
frontend/DESIGN_DELIVERABLES.md: Outlines the app’s design structure, navigation flow, and core screen definitions for TaskQuest.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables, dark/light palettes, and base Tailwind styling overrides including motion‑reduction rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, authentication gating, layout, and routing for all pages in the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button logic using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for initial user profile creation with display name input and hooks to initialize the user profile.
frontend/src/components/completions/Comp: Multi‑step dialog for submitting task proof, reflection, and triggering reward animations after completion.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, mobile menu, header HUD, and user XP progress display.
frontend/src/components/rewards/RewardCe: Full‑screen reward animation showing earned XP, coins, and bonuses, auto‑closing after a delay.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Displays a task with metadata and provides actions for editing, deleting, and completing it.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskEditor: Dialog for creating or editing tasks with fields for title, description, metadata, and saving changes.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFilter: Filter bar allowing users to filter tasks by priority and category.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Wraps children with NextThemesProvider to enable theme switching.
frontend/src/hooks/reminders/useReminder: Polling hook that triggers reminder notifications for due tasks and tracks dismissed reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile and role using the actor and exposes authentication and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, and logout via a React context backed by Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for tasks, completions, rewards, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines a dark game‑themed Tailwind CSS design system with custom colors, components, and UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, query client, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarPage.tsx: Displays the user’s current avatar level and progression stages with themed UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows the user’s task completion history with timestamps, proofs, and reflections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main dashboard with greeting, user XP, task stats, and next due tasks using user and task queries.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Shows productivity insights with task and completion stats plus simple recommendation cards.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with login button, feature highlights, and hero visuals for onboarding new users.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays personal leaderboard stats and weekly progress for the logged-in user.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Guided multi‑step onboarding flow collecting goals and preferences before navigating to the app.
frontend/src/pages/QuestsPage.tsx: Shows daily quests and a weekly boss challenge with progress bars and rewards.
frontend/src/pages/ReminderCenterPage.ts: Displays active and upcoming reminders, grouping them by scheduled time and linking each to its task.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Shows user XP, coins, badges, and reward history with tabs for badges, history, and weekly chest.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for changing theme, sound, music, and motivation style preferences.
frontend/src/pages/StoryPage.tsx: Renders story mode progress and a list of chapters with unlock and completion status.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Fetches and displays user tasks with filtering, task creation, and editing via dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, shadows, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, UI direction, required images, and a list of existing implemented features with versioning.
